dmca.title: Illustrator Requests Takedown from Blog
dmca.body:
January 6, 2004

Google Inc
Attn: Blogger, DMCA complaints
[PRIVATE]
Mountain View, Ca. 94043

Dear Sirs,

The page on your server with the URL of 
http://msophelia.blogspot.com/ contains an illustration from my book 
The Wild Christmas Reindeer and is used without authorization in 
violation of my copyright, The URL of the illustration is: 
http://msophelia.blogspot.com/prancer.jpg

Please remove this jpg file from your servers.

I have enclosed a copy of the a screenshot from your server, along with a photocopy of the illustration from my book and the copyright page from the book.

Thank you for your assistance.

Sincerely,

[PRIVATE]
Jan Brett Studio, Inc.
[PRIVATE]@janbrett.net

[PRIVATE], Post Office Box [PRIVATE], Norwell, Massachusetts  02061, ***-***-***
	www.janbrett.com
